thnx_apply: Thank you for Applying for this job
update_info_msg: Your data has been Updated Successfully
home_main_text: Shaglni is your leading platform to present the job opportunity that matches your skills
add_job_info_msg: A new Job Announcement has been added Successfully
services: We offer a wide range of services to meet your needs in the job search process. Our services include resume analysis, career counseling, skills development workshops, as well as continuous follow-up on job applications.
strategy: Our strategy is to provide support and guidance to every job seeker, whether through improving resumes or training in interview skills. We aim to provide excellent and suitable job opportunities for everyone, to maximize their potential and career aspirations
company_job_seeker_text: Join us today and benefit from exciting and rewarding job opportunities. We strive to provide a supportive and motivating work environment where you can develop your skills and achieve your career aspirations. With advanced training programs and ample opportunities for personal development, we help you build a promising and bright future. Join our team and be part of our journey towards success and excellence in the world of work.
company_home_text: Partnering with us opens the gateway to a wealth of exceptional talent, meticulously sourced to meet your unique needs and propel your business to new heights. With a dedicated focus on understanding your company's vision and requirements, we streamline the recruitment process, delivering top-tier candidates perfectly aligned with your goals. Our collaborative approach ensures seamless integration and long-term success, empowering you to achieve unparalleled growth and excellence in your industry.
